Package sample.mvc

Class View

java.lang.Object
sample.mvc.View
public class View
extends java.lang.Object
View is responsible for providing the user interface. Every single items in the primary stage is shown by View. When some action events occur, View will call the methods in the Model through the Controller. The View class listens to the Model class, and some elements in View will change with changes in Model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void createAndConfigurePane()
    This method creates 2 views, which are used to place all the elements of the start interface and the game interface respectively.
    private void createAndLayoutControlsGame()
    This method adds all the elements of the game screen to sceneGame and styles them.
    private void createAndLayoutControlsStart()
    This method adds all the elements of the start screen to sceneStart and styles them.
    private void createAndLayoutPrimaryStage()
    This method sets the scene in primaryStage as sceneStart and displays it.
    private void observeModelAndUpdateControls()
    This method sets up the listener of the choice box in View and the number of steps and time in Model.
    private void updateControllerFromListener()
    This method sets action event for elements in 2 scenes and calls methods in the Model through the Controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View​(Controller controller, Model model, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This is the only constructor of the View class. It initializes Controller object and Model object. It also sets the stage get from Main class to be the primaryStage.
      Parameters:
      controller - Controller object.
      model - Model object.
      primaryStage - Stage object to show the scenes.

  • Method Details

    • createAndConfigurePane

      private void createAndConfigurePane()
      This method creates 2 views, which are used to place all the elements of the start interface and the game interface respectively.

    • createAndLayoutControlsStart

      private void createAndLayoutControlsStart()
      This method adds all the elements of the start screen to sceneStart and styles them.

    • createAndLayoutControlsGame

      private void createAndLayoutControlsGame()
      This method adds all the elements of the game screen to sceneGame and styles them.

    • updateControllerFromListener

      private void updateControllerFromListener()
      This method sets action event for elements in 2 scenes and calls methods in the Model through the Controller.

    • observeModelAndUpdateControls

      private void observeModelAndUpdateControls()
      This method sets up the listener of the choice box in View and the number of steps and time in Model. The elements in the View will change as these things change.

    • createAndLayoutPrimaryStage

      private void createAndLayoutPrimaryStage()
      This method sets the scene in primaryStage as sceneStart and displays it.
